---
name: Discord Server Feature Request
about: Suggest an idea for a new feature in a Discord server
title: ''
labels: proposed feature
assignees: CodingPenguin1, tux2603

---

**Who are you?**
Are you a student? TA? Faculty? Discord username is optional but nice.

**What feature do you want?**
Can be as broad or narrow as you want, but keep it concise. "I want a channel for this one specific topic"

**Why do you want this feature?**
Would this feature solve some annoyance you have right now? Is it something completely new?

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
